resources.string: “What if ... None of the innovations we enjoy today could have happened without individuals who were willing to go beyond the available knowledge to explore the What If inside of their own mind.” - - Lisa Abeyta\n\n

string.name: ins2
string.b:
Asking a question that begins with "What if" helps us discover what happens when we try something new. These “what ifs” encourage innovators to take risks, make mistakes, discover, invent or create, ignite imagination and inspire challenge the status quo. They aren’t always the solution, but they’re starting points.

 Constructive questions empower and create new possibilities. They lead to action.

string.name: ins4
string.b:
1. Create as many possible answers as possible.
 You have 30 seconds.
 2. Press button “+” when get new answer.
 3. Be honest.
